org.deeplearning4j.text.documentiterator

Class FileLabelAwareIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.text.documentiterator.FileLabelAwareIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LabelAwareIterator

    public class FileLabelAwareIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements LabelAwareIterator
    This is simple filesystem-based LabelAware iterator. It assumes that you have one or more folders organized in the following way: 1st level subfolder: label name 2nd level: bunch of documents for that label You can have as many label folders as you want, as well.
